channel.title: SoccerROM's Soccer News I.V.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Weekly news about top-flight US soccer from SoccerROM.com
channel.itunes:author: Stephen Parr
channel.itunes:summary: Updated weekly, Soccer News I.V. brings unique insight into the top levels of US soccer, including MLS and the US Men's and Women's National Teams.

item.title: Soccer News I.V. - 2008 Episode 12
item.itunes:author: Stephen Parr
item.itunes:subtitle: US v Barbados, CONCACAF Semifinal Groups, New F.C. Dallas Coach, MLS Week 12 Recap and Week 13 Games Preview
item.itunes:summary: This episode of Soccer News I.V. covers the US v Barbados Qualifiers, the CONCACAF Semifinal Qualifier Groups, F.C. Dallas' new Head Coach, a mugging in Brazil, results from MLS week 12, and the upcoming MLS Schedule.
item.itunes:keywords: soccer, US soccer, United States, college soccer, NCAA, Major League Soccer, MLS, FIFA, World Cup

item.title: Soccer News I.V. - 2008 Episode 11

item.itunes:summary: This episode of Soccer News I.V. covers the US v England Friendly, the upcoming US v Spain and US v Argentina Friendlies, McBride's return, Seattle's Sponsor, Chicago's New Name, results form MLS week 10, and the upcoming MLS Schedule.
item.itunes:keywords: soccer, US soccer, United States, college soccer, NCAA, Major League Soccer, MLS, FIFA, World Cup
